item.description:
Bacco is my favorite restaurant in the North End...and since my birthday is earlier in the week, it only makes sense to have dinner at my favorite place. :)  I hope you will join me for great food, good friends, dessert and drinks! I will post more as we get closer to the date.

Following tradition, we will have dinner and then move the party to Caffe Vittoria for dessert.

Please only RSVP if you are 99% you can come. Please be respectful to others who want to come. Thanks!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a reservation upstairs
item.name: North End Dinner - Bacco Ristorante & Bar
